metadata.dc:author: Acevedo, A
Martín Pérez, E
Ortega López, M
Fernández Arjona, M
metadata.dc:description: We report a case of MALT (Mucosa Associated Lymphocytic Tissue) gastric lymphoma which occurred in a 52-year-old woman, associated with Hodgkin's disease, Lymphocyte Predominant type, in epiploic nodes. Although many cases of composite lymphomas have been reported, we were not able to find cases of gastric MALT lymphoma associated with Hodgkin's disease. This is probably the first case reported in the literature.
metadata.dc:title: Linfoma gástrico compuesto: linfoma gástrico tipo MALT asociado a enfermedad de Hodgkin.
[Composite gastric lymphoma: MALT gastric lymphoma associated with Hodgkin's disease].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
